articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Sony raises PlayStation 5 prices in Europe citing 'challenging' economic environment - CNBC
articles.description: Sony said it has made the "tough decision" to raise prices against the "backdrop of a challenging economic environment."
articles.content:
Sony hiked the price of its flagship PlayStation 5 console in Europe, Australia and New Zealand, citing a "challenging economic environment" behind its move.
In Europe, the PS5 Digital Edition will … [+1703 chars]
